.. _api:

API Reference
==============

:Release: |version|
:Date:    |today|

.. module:: drms

This reference manual contains detailed information about classes and
functions included in the ``drms`` module. For an introduction on how to
use the ``drms`` module, see also the :ref:`tutorial <tutorial>`.

-------

   :toctree: generated/

   Client
   SeriesInfo
   ExportRequest

-------------------------------

   :toctree: generated/

   const
